metadata.title: How to Get YouTube Custom URL 2025: Channel URL Guide
metadata.description: Get a custom YouTube channel URL. Requirements and step-by-step setup process.

hero.headline: How to Get YouTube Custom URL
hero.subheadline: Replace random characters with your brand name. Professional channel identity.

sections.content: A custom URL transforms youtube.com/channel/UCxyz123abc into youtube.com/@YourBrandName. It's more professional, easier to share, and helps with brand recognition. YouTube requires meeting certain thresholds before you can claim your custom URL.

content.title: 100+ Subscribers
content.description: Minimum subscriber count required. Can't create custom URL without this.

content.title: 30+ Days Old
content.description: Channel must be at least 30 days old.

content.title: Profile Picture
content.description: Must have uploaded channel profile picture.

sections.title: Claiming Your Custom URL
content: YouTube suggests options based on channel name
Choose or modify your preferred URL

sections.title: Custom URL Best Practices
content: Match your brand name exactly if possible
Consider how it looks in links

faq.question: Can I change my custom URL later?
faq.answer: Very limited. YouTube allows rare changes but don't count on it. Choose carefully the first time—treat it as permanent.

faq.question: What if my name is taken?
faq.answer: Try variations—add 'official', 'tv', 'hq', or your niche. Or secure brand name elsewhere and build toward it.

faq.question: Does custom URL help SEO?
faq.answer: Minimal direct SEO benefit. Main value is professionalism and shareability. Makes your channel easier to find and remember.

faq.question: Can I have multiple custom URLs?
faq.answer: YouTube now uses handles (@name) which function as your URL. Each channel gets one handle/custom URL.
